elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Assign the individual descriptions to the respective subject areas. Note: There are not the same number of descriptions for each topic area.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Subject area: What is my own role?
choices: What arguments and counter-arguments can be found?
What is important to the other side?
What will I pay particular attention to?
It's Monday morning at 8 o'clock.
What topics should be discussed?
What do I want to achieve?
What compromises are possible for me?
I tend to be objective and not emotional.
What is the most important thing for me in a solution?
Is there a fixed allocation of roles in this conversation?
What challenges could arise during the interview?
What is my relationship to the parties involved?

choices.text: What language does the other person speak and understand?
choices.value: What language does the other person speak and understand

choices: What are my counterpart's reasons for talking to me?
What is good about the relationship with the other person and what could be problematic?
What influence do I want to have on the conversation?
How much influence can I have on the course of the conversation?
correctAnswer: Is there a fixed allocation of roles in this conversation?
What influence do I want to have on the conversation?
How much influence can I have on the course of the conversation?
